newsitem.title: USA: Pro-Dex Inc to sell dental management unit.
newsitem.headline: Pro-Dex Inc to sell dental management unit.

text.p: Pro-Dex Inc said on Friday it has entered into an agreement in principle to sell the operations of PDM, the company's dental management business.
Terms of the transaction, which is expected to close on December 15, 1996, were not disclosed. The identity of the prospective buyer was not immediately available.
In June, the company had elected to report PDM's operations on a discontinued basis, Pro-Dex said.
Pro-Dex said in June it had expected to sell the dental management unit by the end of the second quarter of fiscal 1997.
Pro-Dex is not expected to incur any operating losses through its expected disposition and will sell the net assets of this operation for at least equal to its recorded value, the company said.
